Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Venetian Resort Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas (The Strip), you'll be minutes from The Auto Collections and High Roller. This 5-star resort is close to Las Vegas Convention Center and University of Nevada-Las Vegas.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 4027 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Premium TV channels provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers body treatments and facials. Before a night out at the casino, the 2 outdoor swimming pools are a perfect way to relax and recharge. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's 20 restaurants and 6 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Thirsty? Quench your thirst at one of the 5 bars/lounges or 3 poolside bars. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and limo/town car service. Event facilities at this resort consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's 20 restaurants and 6 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Thirsty? Quench your thirst at one of the 5 bars/lounges or 3 poolside bars. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Crystals at City Center - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi

National Atomic Testing Museum - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Desert Research Institute - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Las Vegas Country Club - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Thomas and Mack Center - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Boulevard Mall - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
University of Nevada-Las Vegas - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Marjorie Barrick Museum - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Clark County Library - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi

The preferred airport for The Venetian Resort Hotel & Casino is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Message.Text:
A rollaway fee of $50.00 (plus tax) per room, per night, will be charged and collected by the hotel. This fee is subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees that they may be responsible for but is not a guarantee of the final amount due.

A minimum mandatory hotel-imposed fee of $45.00 (plus tax) per room, per day, will be charged and collected by the hotel at check-in or check-out. The fee is subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees they may be responsible for but not a guarantee of the final amount due. For detailed description of what’s included in the mandatory fee please see hotel policies.

Please be advised The Venetian is currently undergoing renovations to pool deck. To accommodate this construction, The Venetian pool deck will remain closed. The hotel is working on alternative options so that guests can enjoy their Las Vegas experience. Dates are subject to change without prior notification.

Essential Information:
Early departure fee may apply Applicable from 20/Dec/2018 to 31/Dec/9999
Resort fees to be paid at check-in by guest. Applicable from 21/Dec/2018 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: Please note that a mandatory daily Resort Fee of USD 45.00 plus tax per room per night is payable directly to the hotel. Please note only Grab n GO breakfast promotions contain a maximum of 2 FREE Continental Grab and Go packaged Breakfast per day (not sit-down). Any additional breakfast will need to be paid directly to hotel. At least one occupant must be at least twenty-one (21) years of age to check in. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
